chara.textHome: I'm Natsuki Utsuho!

I'm in both the cheerleading
and baseball clubs!

I probably don't need to say this,
but I'm not a baseball player.
I just manage the team.

I've been with the team
since we were in elementary school.

There's nothing better than coming
together with the ones you love
to fight hard and do your best!

I can say this proudly, with my head
held high... I made it this far because
I worked my hardest.

The spoils you reap from your own
hard work and effort are the ones
that make you happiest!
Go for it!
I can reach even higher heights, I know it!

Take just one step forward,
and you might find something
new that makes you happy!
Let's gooo! Natsuki!
I wanna show you just how strong I got!

I won't run even from matches
where I'm at a disadvantage!
I'll take the mound with pride, just watch!
We! Can! Do it!

Y'know, I think my cheers give people a
really strong boost in Magical Girl battles just
like they do for players in baseball games!

So I'm gonna work my hardest to cheer
everyone on in those fights, too!
Hey. I was getting sick of waiting.

At least I managed to get
a lot of vocal training in,
so I guess it wasn't a waste.
Morrrning!
Ready to make today an amazing day?!
Huh? You're tired?

All right, this time only, I'm gonna be
your personal cheerleader!
Did you eat lunch already?

You've gotta get the right nutrition
in your diet.
They say a good pitcher always eats well!
I love pro baseball!
Night games are especially fun.
Let's go see a game sometime!
Okay, that's it for practice today!
Come on, let's get to bed early!

It will affect tomorrow's practice
if you stay up late tonight.
Recently I redesigned my jersey.

So I was thinking: I've gotta
redesign my cheers to match.
Isn't it time to start practice?

They say it takes three days
to make up for one missed session!
No time to lose!
The worst thing is having regrets.

Whether it's baseball or a fight with a 
Witch, that chance will never come back.
So give it your all...always!

Whenever I watch baseball matches,
I just wanna grab the microphone
and start cheering.
It feels so good to get totally into it.

I became a Magical Girl so that I could
go to the finals with my old baseball
team from elementary school.
I don't regret it one bit.

The other day, my brother scolded me
for not putting in 100%.

How does he always know exactly
what's going on with me?

I've become a bit more girly since I started
cheerleading, so my mom seems relieved.
I still have killer abs, though!

You know,
Akira actually really likes girly stuff.
I think she'd be a great cheerleader.
She can really project her voice, too.
Hey, do you know this manga?

It's a girly one that Akira
recommended to me.

Do other girls really like arrogant
guys like the one in the story?

Hey, look at these. They're our new jerseys!
Which do you think is better?
This one?

The crop top, huh? Don't you think
it shows a bit too much skin?

Hey! Don't you think this jersey
would look great on Akira?

I'm gonna get her to wear it sometime.
I know she'll hate it, though!
Let's gooo! Fight! WIN!
Let's gooo! Fight! WIN!
*Chuckle*
How was that? Are you fired up?
All together now! Let's gooo!
Don't forget to stretch after the game!
Nice play! Good work!
I gave it everything I got too!
Yeah! Let's win again!
Go! Fight! Win!

That's how I cheer! Honestly,
that's how I manage my baseball team too!
I'm Natsuki Utsuho!
Yep, perfect!

Whether it's working out or anything else,
you gotta make sure to do it day in, day out!
Mmm! I feel exhilarated and ready to go!
I feel like giving myself a big cheer!
Keep! On! Trying!

I won't take it easy,
I'll keep on fighting, just like this!

Cheerleading, managing baseball,
being a Magical Girl...
Sometimes it can feel pretty tough.
But I picked these paths out for myself.

I gotta take responsibility
and do great at all of 'em!

You have to challenge yourself
to do difficult things!
Just like working out.

You can't grow if you stay in your
comfort zone the whole time!
